verses.text: Mamin Jehov치, a in rey in tik, tzin tzalaji, yujto syal uuj smasanil. Yelxo val tzin te tzalaji, yujto uuj val ix vak' ganar.
Ix a b'o tas snib'ej in k'ool, maj a tenek'laj tas ix in k'ana'.
Te niwan wach'il ix ak' t'ayin, ix ak'anq'ue jun corona oro t'a in jolom.
Ix in k'an t'ayach to tzak' najatb'oc in q'uinal, a achxo ix ak' t'ayin.
Te b'inajnac in yuj a colval. Uuj val syal vuuj, ay pax in tziquiquial.
Manh jantacoc a wach'k'olal ix ak' t'ayin t'a masanil tiempo. Ste tzalaj in k'ool t'a ichanh.
Mamin Jehov치, ek'al ach t'a yib'anh masanil, yujto a a wach'k'olal ayoch yipoc in k'ool, yuj chi' malaj b'ak'uinh ol in ak'joc ganar.
Mamin rey, ol a yam masanil eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach, aton eb' malaj sgana tzach yila'.
Ayic ol a ch'oxan a b'ha t'a skal eb', ol a satancanel eb', icha val tz'aj junok tas slajviel yuj k'ak'. Ha Jehov치 ol satanel eb' yet' yoval sk'ool, haxo k'ak' ol ak'an lajvoquel eb'.
Ha yuninal eb' ajk'ool chi' yet' eb' yinhtilal eb', ol a satcanel eb' t'a skal anima t'a sat lu'um tik.
Wach'chom ix snib'ej eb' ix ach yixtej, ix say val modo eb' tas tz'aj ach yak'an ganar, palta maj yal-laj yuj eb',
yujto a ach tik ix a pechcanb'at eb' ayic ix och ijan a jul-lab' t'a eb'.
Mamin Jehov치, ach ik'jocab'chaanh yujto masanil syal uuj. Ol co b'itej ipalil.
